welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cheval, the charming city known for its stunning natural beauty and friendly locals. We invite you to soak in the sights, sounds, and flavors of our city and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tampa International Airport houses all the major airlines and serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside A
terminals.description: Airside A is one of four airside terminals at Tampa International Airport and primarily serves domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines and Delta.

terminals.name: Airside C
terminals.description: Airside C is one of four airside terminals at Tampa International Airport and primarily serves domestic flights for airlines such as JetBlue and Southwest.

terminals.name: Airside E
terminals.description: Airside E is one of four airside terminals at Tampa International Airport and primarily serves international flights for airlines such as Lufthansa and British Airways.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after watching a short advertisement.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Peter O'Knight Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Peter O'Knight Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
